<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Barrier Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=3370) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 122</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)

</column>

---

When you cast _shield_, you can modify the spell to create a solid barrier you can use for cover, but not for blocking. You can't use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction when the spell is modified in this way, but you (and only you) can spend an action to [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) to gain standard cover from it.
name: Barrier Shield
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _shield_
